description: Number of diagonally symmetric polyominoes with n cells.
comments: This sequence counts polyominoes with exactly the symmetry group of order 2 generated by a single reflection about a diagonal.
references: D. H. Redelmeier, Counting polyominoes: yet another attack, Discrete Math., 36 (1981), 191-203.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: Tomás Oliveira e Silva, Enumeration of polyominoes
D. H. Redelmeier, Table 3 of Counting polyominoes...
crossrefs: Sequences classifying polyominoes by symmetry group: A000105, A006746, A006747, A006748, A006749, A056877, A056878, A142886, A144553, A144554.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Extended to n=28 by Tomás Oliveira e Silva.
